step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job completing the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply when rolling back.
Second rep starting well. Ensure your shoulders stay down, not creeping up towards your ears.
Excellent! Continue to focus on the backward and downward circular motion of the shoulder blades.
Fantastic finish! You're doing a great job improving shoulder mobility and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply as you roll your shoulders back to help with breathing and oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work!
